wikipedia_page.main: Edward Noel Mellish   (24 December 1880 – 8 July 1962) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: *Edward Mellish (1880–1962) - recipient of the Victoria Cross
One former vicar of the church was Edward Mellish who was awarded the Victoria Cross in World War I.
